hero.title: DECOMPE
hero.subtitle: Empowering Digital Creation
hero.description: DECOMPE 4.0 is a platform for young talents to showcase their best work in creating innovative digital interfaces. More than just a competition, it is a place to learn, collaborate, and contribute to the growth of Indonesia’s digital future.

innovation.title: Showcase Your Potential
innovation.description: This is your chance to bring out your best creative ideas in UI/UX design.

community.title: Contribute to the Industry
community.description: Your work isn’t just practice; it can be part of shaping Indonesia’s digital future.

impact.title: Gain Valuable Experience
impact.description: More than a contest, DECOMPE 4.0 is a journey that opens doors to greater opportunities.

about.title: Evolution of DECOMPE
about.subtitle: The journey of design innovation that inspires Indonesia's digital generation
about.themeDescription1: In the midst of an unstoppable digital revolution, the interface becomes the battlefield between humans and technology. DECOMPE 4.0 calls digital pioneers to create designs that are not only visually stunning, but also functionally transformative.
about.themeDescription2: This theme challenges us to design the future where every digital interaction becomes an unforgettable experience, every interface becomes a work of art, and every innovation becomes a legacy of civilization.
about.targetSubtitle: Who is ready to become an agent of digital change?

decompe1.title: DECOMPE 1.0
decompe1.subtitle: The Beginning
decompe1.description: Genesis era of digital design. The first foundation that built the UI/UX creativity ecosystem among Indonesian students.

decompe2.title: DECOMPE 2.0
decompe2.subtitle: Business Integration
decompe2.description: "Shaping Creative Business Technology" - Fusion between design, business strategy, and technology for comprehensive solutions.

decompe3.title: DECOMPE 3.0
decompe3.subtitle: Complete Ecosystem
decompe3.description: Complete ecosystem: intensive bootcamp, tight competition, and inspirational webinars for a full transformation experience.

registration.title: Registration
registration.subtitle: Show your potential and win millions of Rupiah in prizes at DECOMPE 4.0!
registration.processDesc: 3 easy steps to register for DECOMPE 4.0
registration.investmentDesc: Find the perfect package to support your journey in this event.

fillForm.title: Complete the Form
fillForm.description: Fill in the registration form with your personal data

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Choose your package and make a payment through the available methods

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.description: Wait for confirmation and access to exclusive preparation materials

items.software: Design software (Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch)
items.internet: Stable internet connection for online sessions

items.experience: Have an interest in digital design, UI/UX, or product development
items.portfolio: Commitment to follow the entire program series

items.fullProgram: Participants can register individually or in teams
items.timeAvailability: Each team consists of a minimum of 1 (one) and a maximum of 3 (three) people
items.activeParticipation: Submitted work must be original and have never been entered in another competition
items.projectCompletion: Participants must follow all stages of the competition, including the mini-bootcamp, submission, and judging sessions

common.readyToJoin: Ready to Transform Your Digital Future?
common.readyToTransform: Ready to Change the Digital World?
common.joinDescription: Don't miss the opportunity to be a part of DECOMPE 4.0, where innovation meets creativity and visionaries like you find their stage.
common.transformDescription: Join DECOMPE 4.0 and start your journey to become a reliable UI/UX designer ready to create innovations and change the digital world.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about DECOMPE 4.0

1.a: DECOMPE 4.0 is a national competition and bootcamp focused on digital transformation, innovation, and future skills.

2.a: Students, university students, recent graduates, and professionals interested in digital technology and innovation are welcome to join.

3.q: What are the available registration packages?
3.a: We provide Early Batch, Standard, and Squad packages with different benefits suitable for individuals and teams.

4.a: A portfolio is recommended but not mandatory. Clear motivation and a willingness to learn are just as important.

5.a: Click the Register button on the homepage or open the Registration page, then fill out the form and follow the payment instructions.

6.q: What is included in the bootcamp program?
6.a: Mentoring, practical projects, curated learning materials, and a certificate upon completion (depending on the package).

7.q: How do I contact DECOMPE support?
7.a: Contact the provided Contact Person via WhatsApp or email us through the Official Contact section.

8.q: What are the technical requirements to participate?
8.a: A laptop with a stable internet connection and basic development tools. Detailed requirements are on the Registration page.
